name: Save Me
description:
Year 2154 - Planet Gargl 22

Colony of human excavators lives through devastating nuclear explosion. Death of everyone is matter of minutes. Survivors are dependent on rescue jet that is to take them to galactic cruiser scheduled to leave in 2 minutes. Survival of entire population depends on rescue jet's pilot. You are that pilot.

Controls: 

- Steer with left and right arrow

- Accelerate and decelerate using up and down arrow

Fly over survivors to take them, then fly to base to drop them off to safety. Watch out for 2:00 deadline and limited fuel!

In summer 2014, we decided to visit Copenhagen and on that occasion idea emerged, to make a small private game jam during that trip. Save me is a result of one week long effort to realize idea we had in mind.
